title: Trade for my t206 hugh Duffy

posts.post_title: Trade for my t206 hugh Duffy
posts.post_content:
I have this extra t206 duffy Im looking to trade for a piedmont back George Davis or Frank Smith Boston-Chicago in similar shape or a piedmont back Fielder Jones hands on hip in better shape. thanks!
